text: Moses ga helekai gi Aaron mo ana dama daane Eleazar mo Ithamar, “Goodou hudee hagamagemage ina nia ngaahulu o godou libogo, be e hahaahi godou gahu belee hagamodongoohia bolo goodou e manawa gee. Maa goodou gaa hai beenei, gei goodou gaa mmade, gei Dimaadua ga hagawelewele gi digau huogodoo. Gei digau Israel huogodoo ala i golo le e dumaalia ginai gi manawa gee gi meemaa aanei ala ne mmade i di ahi dela ne hagau mai go Dimaadua.
